ACTIVITIES /TRANSACTIONS: Start-up of RTGS/SSS applications.
Update Official Prices of securities, earmarking securities for ILF.
System opens for effecting transactions.

EVENT:
ILF/Auto reversal of Repos and 
Standing Deposit Facility (SDF)
ACTIVITIES /TRANSACTIONS: Grant ILF and settle second leg of Repos of OMO and SDF

EVENT:
Maturities/Interest payments, start of 
the day (SOD) file and maturities of 
CBSL Securities
ACTIVITIES /TRANSACTIONS:
Settlement  of  maturity  proceeds/coupon  payments  of  securities, 
effecting  LankaSettle  charges/penalties  and  maturities  of  CBSL 
Securities.

EVENT:
Multilateral Net Settlement (MLNS) 
Batch from LankaClear
ACTIVITIES /TRANSACTIONS: SLIPS Cycle 1/Main Clearing of CITS.

EVENT:
Primary Auction/ Outright sales/ 
Purchases / Long Term Repo Auction/ 
Issue of Long Term CBSL Securities
ACTIVITIES /TRANSACTIONS:
Settlement  of  OMO  outright  sales,  purchases,  Long  Term  CBSL 
Securities Auction and first leg of Long Term Repo Auction.
Common ATM Switch (CAS) Cycle 1
Common Electronic Fund Transfer Switch (CEFTS) Cycle 1
Common POS Switch (CPS) Cycle 1

EVENT:
Reversal of Reverse Repos and 
Standing Lending Facility (SLF)
ACTIVITIES /TRANSACTIONS: Settlement of second leg of Reverse Repos under OMO and SLF.
Settlement of second leg of LSF under OMO
CAS Cycle 2

EVENT:
Closure of Primary Auction 
Settlement/Short Term CBSL 
Securities Auction
ACTIVITIES /TRANSACTIONS:
Settlement of securities under Primary Auction.
Settlement of Short Term CBSL Securities Auction
CEFTS Cycle 2
CPS Cycle 2
SLIPS Cycle 2
Settlement Clearing and Adjustment Clearing.

EVENT:
Cut-off time for standing facilities 
(SDF/ SLF)
ACTIVITIES /TRANSACTIONS: SLF and SDF windows are closed for participants

EVENT:
Primary cut-off time for third party 
transactions
ACTIVITIES /TRANSACTIONS:
Close for new transactions (for T + 0) in favour of third parties, 
except for bank-to-bank (MT2XX series).

EVENT:
Cut-off time for Participant managed 
ILF Repo creation
ACTIVITIES /TRANSACTIONS: Participants should not initiate ILF Repos after 1230 hrs.
Settlement of first leg of SDF
Settlement of first leg of SLF.
Repayment of ILF.

EVENT:
Final Cut-off Time
Closure of System for business
ACTIVITIES /TRANSACTIONS:
No  further  inputs  are  accepted.    With  the  closure  of  system 
for  business,  queue/Settlement  processing  will  cease  and  any 
transactions still in queues will be rejected by the system.
